# environment

**Instance Property**

The current environment of the view that created the custom animation.

## Declaration

```swift
var environment: EnvironmentValues { get }
```

## Discussion

An instance of [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/CustomAnimation] uses this property to read environment values from the view that created the animation. To learn more about environment values including how to define custom environment values, see [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/EnvironmentValues].
title: environment
